channel.title: [Error] Help with Guild Fisher
channel.description:
I'm having some trouble with this old script. I have the correct scar version (2.03) and the correct includes.
I have no scripting/coding knowledge whatsoever, but this looks like an easy fix.
Script: Guild Fisher v1.6, by Taminoo
Error : Line 89: [Error] (2734:1): Invalid number of parameters in script
[code]procedure Randoms; begin if(EquipGone)then begin repeat if(Fish='Lobbies')then PickUpObject('Take Lobster pot',607847) if(Fish='Shark')then //Line 89 PickUpObject('Take Harpoon',942722) Trys:=Trys+1; until(Look=Trys) if(Look=Trys)then ToBank; end;[/code]
Thanks in advance for any help.
